page.title: 04ROYAL KENT SCHOOL,OXSHOTT
page.content: The Royal Kent school has a fairly modern building,surrounded by its own playing field and playground. 3 out of 24 in the class were born in foreign countries - America, Cyprus and New Zealand. Only one person's father is unemployed and everyone's mother works. There are 2 G.P.'s, 2 secretaries, 2 accountants, 2 nursery teachers, an artist, a photographer and a citizens' advice bureau worker. One person in the class lives on a farm and about four people live in old houses. Seventeen people out of the class travel to school by car, 6 walk and the older children are allowed to cycle. The whole class watches television in their spare time. Thirteen play sport, one person does martial arts, 8 play musical instruments and two windsurf.
